node.title: CDC Larnaka Meet & Greet Meetup
node.body: ### Event Description Welcome to the CDC - Cyprus Developer Community! Join us for our monthly Larnaka meet & greet event. Meet likeminded people, discuss topics we would like to hear about in upcoming talks, welcome potential speakers, discuss all things tech and have fun! Notice with regards to COVID: All attendees must follow measures in accordance with Ministry of Health directives. https://www.pio.gov.cy/coronavirus/eng ### Location The Brewery Larnaka - https://goo.gl/maps/UWSwofFp37nvtGmb6 ### Date 15.04.2022 ### Time 18.30 ### Duration 2h ### Code of Conduct - [X] I agree to follow this project's [Code of Conduct](https://berlincodeofconduct.org)

node.title: A practical introduction to Test Driven Development (TDD) by Marios Georgiou
node.body:
### Event Description

GDG is happy to host Marios Georgiou!

In this talk, Marios will walk us through the steps of creating automated unit tests that run every time we build our code, and cover all the basic concepts of unit testing, code coverage and some best practices by showing examples in an interactive, workshop like experience.

This course is targeted to beginners or to more experience developers who want to learn more about TDD.

The examples will use very simple code written in React, however the concepts and practices are similarly applicable on most programming languages, e.g. Java, Python etc.

This is a hybrid event. The physical event will take place at University of Cyprus (Nicosia), in the department of Computer Science building THEE 01, Room B101 (Basement, Walk-in Lab). map: https://goo.gl/maps/BoDyu6fmyNPaYkwC6

The virtual event will be on zoom (see below) and also on CDC discord channel. Visit https://cdc.cy to access the discord channel and view the events channel for details on how to access.

For the participants of the physical event, pizza and refreshments will be offered by our sponsor "TSYS A Global Payments Company".

For RSVP, kindly visit https://gdg.community.dev/j/wt7w56qhpa29j/

Looking forward to see you there!

Don't forget to like our FB page at https://www.facebook.com/GDGCyprus and also checkout http://cdc.cy, the Cyprus Developer Community portal.

Like/Share :)

Zoom:
https://us06web.zoom.us/j/81182498281?pwd=RTdwakZ5ZklvdG8xOW5ESzdjSElKQT09

Meeting ID: 811 8249 8281
Passcode: 576202

### Location

Nicosia at University Of Cyprus / Virtual on zoom and discord

### Date

17.05.2022

### Time

19.00

### Duration

1h30m

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's [Code of Conduct](https://berlincodeofconduct.org)

node.title: BeerJS Limassol #2
node.body:
### Event Description

BeerJS is back in Limassol! Let's meet and talk stuff and have fun!

**note on drinking and js**

BeerJS is about creating social spaces to strengthen software communities. There is no requirement to drink to participate, nor talk specifically js (I personally can support conversation on variety of topics and I would love to listen to people talking about it)

### Location

bono

### Date

29.09.2022

### Time

18.30

### Duration

2h

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's [Code of Conduct](https://berlincodeofconduct.org)
